slides.title: WCAG Guidelines
slides.content:
# WCAG Guidelines üìã

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.

## Four Principles (POUR):

| Principle | Meaning |
|-----------|--------|
| **Perceivable** | Can users perceive content? |
| **Operable** | Can users operate interface? |
| **Understandable** | Can users understand content? |
| **Robust** | Works with assistive tech? |

## Conformance Levels:
```
Level A   ‚Üí Minimum accessibility
Level AA  ‚Üí Standard (most laws require)
Level AAA ‚Üí Highest accessibility
```

## Key Guidelines:
- Text alternatives for images
- Captions for videos
- Keyboard accessible
- Sufficient color contrast
- Consistent navigation
- Error identification

slides.title: Keyboard Navigation
slides.content:
# Keyboard Navigation ‚å®Ô∏è

All functionality must work without a mouse.

## Key Navigation Keys:
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| Tab | Move to next element |
| Shift+Tab | Move to previous |
| Enter | Activate button/link |
| Space | Toggle checkbox, activate button |
| Arrow keys | Navigate within component |
| Escape | Close modal/menu |

## Focus Management:
```css
/* Never do this */
*:focus { outline: none; } /* ‚ùå */

/* Custom focus styles */
button:focus {
    outline: 2px solid #0066ff;
    outline-offset: 2px;
}
```

## Tab Order:
```html
<!-- Natural order follows DOM -->
<input tabindex="0">  <!-- Normal -->
<input tabindex="-1"> <!-- Skip -->
<input tabindex="1">  <!-- Avoid! -->
```

## Focus Trapping for Modals:
- Keep focus inside modal
- Return focus when closed

slides.title: Video and Audio
slides.content:
# Video & Audio Accessibility üé¨

Make multimedia accessible to all.

## Captions:
```html
<video controls>
    <source src="video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
    <track 
        kind="captions" 
        src="captions.vtt" 
        srclang="en" 
        label="English"
        default
    >
</video>
```

## WebVTT Format:
```
WEBVTT

00:00:01.000 --> 00:00:04.000
Welcome to our tutorial!

00:00:05.000 --> 00:00:08.000
Today we'll learn about accessibility.
```

## Requirements:
| Content | Requirement |
|---------|-------------|
| Video with audio | Captions |
| Audio only | Transcript |
| Video (no audio) | Audio description (if needed) |

## Best Practices:
- ‚úÖ Provide captions (not auto-generated)
- ‚úÖ Include transcripts
- ‚úÖ Avoid autoplay
- ‚úÖ Controls accessible via keyboard

slides.title: Testing Accessibility
slides.content:
# Testing Accessibility üß™

Validate your accessibility implementation.

## Automated Tools:
- **Lighthouse** - Chrome DevTools
- **axe DevTools** - Browser extension
- **WAVE** - Web accessibility evaluator
- **Pa11y** - Command line tool

## Manual Testing:
1. **Keyboard only** - Navigate without mouse
2. **Screen reader** - Test with NVDA/VoiceOver
3. **Zoom** - Test at 200% zoom
4. **Color contrast** - Check ratios

## Keyboard Checklist:
- [ ] Can Tab through all interactive elements
- [ ] Focus visible on all elements
- [ ] Can activate buttons with Enter
- [ ] Can close modals with Escape

## Screen Reader Checklist:
- [ ] All images have alt text
- [ ] Form fields have labels
- [ ] Headings are logical
- [ ] Links are descriptive

slides.title: Common Mistakes
Accessibility Checklist
slides.content:
# A11y Checklist ‚úÖ

## Structure:
- [ ] Semantic HTML elements
- [ ] Proper heading hierarchy (h1‚Üíh2‚Üíh3)
- [ ] Skip link to main content
- [ ] Page has `<title>`
- [ ] Language attribute on `<html>`

## Images:
- [ ] All images have alt text
- [ ] Decorative images have `alt=""`
- [ ] Complex images have descriptions

## Forms:
- [ ] All inputs have labels
- [ ] Required fields indicated
- [ ] Errors are clearly identified
- [ ] Fieldsets group related inputs

## Keyboard:
- [ ] All interactive elements focusable
- [ ] Focus visible
- [ ] Tab order logical
- [ ] No keyboard traps

## Color:
- [ ] Contrast ratio meets AA (4.5:1)
- [ ] Color not sole indicator

## Media:
- [ ] Videos have captions
- [ ] Audio has transcripts

## Remember:
| Do | Don't |
|----|-------|
| Use `<button>` | Use `<div>` as button |
| Add labels | Rely on placeholder |
| Keep focus visible | Remove outlines |
| Provide alt text | Leave images blank |
